page.title: 09ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My dad works on a farm.He gets up at quarter to four to milk the cows.He comes home again at half past seven.After he has breakfast he sits down and goes to sleep.At quarter to nine he goes back to work.He comes home again at quarter past five .If hes silage making he goes back to work and comes back about half past seven in the evening or later.My mum is a secretary at Devizes Motor Company. she does the paper work and she types aswell. she leaves for work at half past eight and she gets in town at nine and finishes at one. On monday she finishes at quarter past three.
